intro: Stenoptera longiscapa, commonly known as the broad-leafed stenoptera, is a species of flowering plant in the family Araceae. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil and Peru. The plant features broad, arrow-shaped leaves with a smooth, waxy surface. Its inflorescence consists of a spadix surrounded by a spathe, typical of the Araceae family. Stenoptera longiscapa is often cultivated for its ornamental value due to its striking foliage and unique floral structure.
